title: Include automation rates in getAllGenerationRates() for technique and renown
description:
In src/core/progression/auto-generation.ts, getAllGenerationRates() hardcodes technique and renown to ZERO (line ~117-118). Fix this to calculate actual rates from automations.

The book-summarizer automation (in src/core/progression/automations.ts) runs every 60s and converts $10 → +1 TP when enabled. This should be reflected as ~1 TP/min in the rate display.

Approach:
1. In getAllGenerationRates(), check the game state for enabled automations
2. For each active automation that produces technique (or renown), calculate its effective rate per second
3. The book-summarizer runs every 60s producing 1 TP, so its rate = 1/60 TP/s
4. Only include the rate if the automation is actually enabled (book-summarizer hardware upgrade purchased)
5. Return the computed rates instead of ZERO

Files:
- src/core/progression/auto-generation.ts (main fix - compute automation rates)
- src/core/progression/automations.ts (reference - understand automation intervals and outputs)
- src/upgrades/upgrade-definitions.ts (reference - which automations are active based on upgrades)
close_reason: Closed
